View Javadoc

1   package org.openimaj.demos.sandbox.tldcpp.detector;
2   
3   import org.openimaj.image.FImage;
4   
5   /**
6    * a 2D double array such that each element is the sum of each
7    * value to the top left of the element,
8    * @author Sina Samangooei (ss@ecs.soton.ac.uk)
9    *
10   */
11  public class IntegralImage {
12  	double[][] data; 
13  	
14  	IntegralImage() {
15  	}
16  	void calcIntImg(FImage img, boolean squared)
17  	{
18  		data = new double[img.height][img.width];
19  		float[][] input = img.pixels;
20  		double[][] output = data;
21  		for(int j = 0;j < img.height;j++){
22  			for(int i = 0;i < img.width;i++){
23  				double A = (i > 0) ? output[j][i - 1] : 0;
24  				double B = (j > 0) ? output[j - 1][i] : 0;
25  				double C = (j > 0 && i > 0) ? output[j - 1][ i - 1] : 0;
26  				double value = input[j][i];
27  				if(squared) {
28  					value = value*value;
29  				}
30  				output[j][i] = A + B - C + value;
31  			}
32  		}
33  
34  	}
35  }
